database.name: VIEW CSLCPJA_RPT_JOURNAL_V
database.view: SELECT get_uuid() AS cslcpja_rpt_journal_v_id, to_char('xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx') AS ad_client_id, to_char('xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx') AS ad_org_id, now() AS created, to_char('xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx') AS createdby, now() AS updated, to_char('xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx') AS updatedby, to_char('Y') AS isactive, to_char('xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx') AS ad_table_id, to_char('xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx') AS recordid, to_char('xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx') AS documentno, to_char('') AS description, now() AS dateacct FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT get_uuid() AS cslcpja_rpt_journal_v_id, to_char(m_inout.ad_client_id) AS ad_client_id, to_char(m_inout.ad_org_id) AS ad_org_id, m_inout.created, to_char(m_inout.createdby) AS createdby, m_inout.updated, to_char(m_inout.updatedby) AS updatedby, to_char('Y') AS isactive, to_char('319') AS ad_table_id, to_char(m_inout.m_inout_id) AS recordid, to_char(m_inout.documentno) AS documentno, to_char(m_inout.description) AS description, m_inout.dateacct FROM m_inout WHERE m_inout.docstatus = 'CO' AND m_inout.posted = 'Y' AND m_inout.issotrx = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT get_uuid() AS cslcpja_rpt_journal_v_id, to_char(m_inout.ad_client_id) AS ad_client_id, to_char(m_inout.ad_org_id) AS ad_org_id, m_inout.created, to_char(m_inout.createdby) AS createdby, m_inout.updated, to_char(m_inout.updatedby) AS updatedby, to_char('Y') AS isactive, to_char('319') AS ad_table_id, to_char(m_inout.m_inout_id) AS recordid, to_char(m_inout.documentno) AS documentno, to_char(m_inout.description) AS description, m_inout.dateacct FROM m_inout WHERE m_inout.docstatus = 'CO' AND m_inout.posted = 'Y' AND m_inout.issotrx = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT get_uuid() AS cslcpja_rpt_journal_v_id, to_char(a_amortization.ad_client_id) AS ad_client_id, to_char(a_amortization.ad_org_id) AS ad_org_id, a_amortization.created, to_char(a_amortization.createdby) AS createdby, a_amortization.updated, to_char(a_amortization.updatedby) AS updatedby, to_char('Y') AS isactive, to_char('800060') AS ad_table_id, to_char(a_amortization.a_amortization_id) AS recordid, to_char(a_amortization.documentno) AS documentno, to_char(a_amortization.description) AS description, a_amortization.dateacct FROM a_amortization WHERE a_amortization.posted = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT get_uuid() AS cslcpja_rpt_journal_v_id, to_char(gl_journal.ad_client_id) AS ad_client_id, to_char(gl_journal.ad_org_id) AS ad_org_id, gl_journal.created, to_char(gl_journal.createdby) AS createdby, gl_journal.updated, to_char(gl_journal.updatedby) AS updatedby, to_char('Y') AS isactive, to_char('224') AS ad_table_id, to_char(gl_journal.gl_journal_id) AS recordid, to_char(gl_journal.documentno) AS documentno, to_char(gl_journal.description) AS description, gl_journal.dateacct FROM gl_journal WHERE gl_journal.posted = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT get_uuid() AS cslcpja_rpt_journal_v_id, to_char(sspr_payroll.ad_client_id) AS ad_client_id, to_char(sspr_payroll.ad_org_id) AS ad_org_id, sspr_payroll.created, to_char(sspr_payroll.createdby) AS createdby, sspr_payroll.updated, to_char(sspr_payroll.updatedby) AS updatedby, to_char('Y') AS isactive, to_char('BCEEDEC4FE2B4B3FAEA32084BB88AD95') AS ad_table_id, to_char(sspr_payroll.sspr_payroll_id) AS recordid, to_char(sspr_payroll.documentno) AS documentno, to_char(sspr_payroll.description) AS description, sspr_payroll.datedoc AS dateacct FROM sspr_payroll WHERE sspr_payroll.posted = 'Y'
